executable.title: Label Refinement
executable.description: This is a CLI supporting module and it is supposed to not be used directly with a simple input image.
executable.contributor: Antonio Carlos Senra Filho (University of Sao Paulo), Luiz Otavio Murta Junior (University of Sao Paulo)
executable.acknowledgements: This work was partially funded by CAPES and CNPq

image.name: GMMask
image.label: Gray Matter Mask
image.description: Gray matter mask. This mask must be in the same input volume physical space.

integer.name: numClass
integer.label: Number of classes
integer.description: Set the number of tissues classes desired to segment in the input image. Default: 6 (Background, CSF, Gray Matter, White Matter, perilesional area and lesion)

integer.name: lesionMinSize
integer.label: Minimum Lesion Size
integer.description: The minimum size (pixels) that is considered as a true lesion.
